name: DoNotSendFundsHere
description: DoNotSendFundsHere. This contract is a stub to recover mainnet funds sent to the Prysmatic Labs testnet address. The testnet contract is deployed on Goerli, not on Ethereum's main network. Do not send funds here! If you sent funds here by mistake, please email contact at prysmaticlabs.com with proof that you are the originator of the lost funds.

functionDecorators.name: approveERC20Funds
functionDecorators.description: Approve ERC20 spending for a particular ERC20 token.

parameterDecorators.name: _spender
parameterDecorators.description: The spender address to authorize spending on behalf of this contract.

functionDecorators.name: changeOwner
functionDecorators.description: Change the sole owner of the contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the new owner of this contract.

functionDecorators.name: recoverERC20Funds
functionDecorators.description: Send all of the ERC20 token owned by this contract to the contract owner.

functionDecorators.name: recoverETHFunds
functionDecorators.description: Send all ETH held by the contract to the contract owner.
